description: Returns the projected metrics of Amazon ECS service recommendations.

parameters.name: serviceArn
parameters.description: The ARN that identifies the Amazon ECS service. The following is the format of the ARN: arn:aws:ecs:region:aws_account_id:service/cluster-name/service-name.

parameters.name: stat
parameters.description: The statistic of the projected metrics.

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: The granularity, in seconds, of the projected metrics data points.

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: The timestamp of the first projected metrics data point to return.

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: The timestamp of the last projected metrics data point to return.

nested_items.name: recommendedOptionProjectedMetrics
nested_items.description: An array of objects that describes the projected metrics.

nested_items.name: recommendedCpuUnits
nested_items.description: The recommended CPU size for the Amazon ECS service.

nested_items.name: recommendedMemorySize
nested_items.description: The recommended memory size for the Amazon ECS service.

nested_items.name: projectedMetrics
nested_items.description: An array of objects that describe the projected metric.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the projected metric.
Cpu -- The percentage of allocated compute units that are currently in use on the service tasks.
Memory -- The percentage of memory that's currently in use on the service tasks.

nested_items.name: timestamps
nested_items.description: The timestamps of the projected metric.

nested_items.name: upperBoundValues
nested_items.description: The upper bound values for the projected metric.

nested_items.name: lowerBoundValues
nested_items.description: The lower bound values for the projected metric.
